snippet: Thousands of Airbnb hosts in New York State have signed a petition objecting to a subpoena that the state’s attorney general has filed that demands records of those who have rented out their homes.
abstract: Thousands of Airbnb hosts in New York State have signed a petition objecting to a subpoena that the state’s attorney general has filed that demands records of those who have rented out their homes.

headline.main: Airbnb Hosts Campaign Against New York Subpoena
